data.title: Traces of Vermeer
data.meta_description: Traces of Vermeer - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document acknowledges those who helped and supported the author in researching and writing about Johannes Vermeer's painting techniques. It thanks friends, colleagues, historians, and materials suppliers who provided advice, encouragement, and resources over the course of the project. The author conducted experiments in their painting studio to test how Vermeer may have used a camera obscura, and received valuable feedback on the results. The acknowledgements recognize those integral to bringing the book to publication and helping ensure accuracy.
